snippet: Several of Lance Armstrong’s former teammates, including George Hincapie and Levi Leipheimer, will testify in the United States Anti-Doping Agency’s case against the retired cyclist.
abstract: Several of Lance Armstrong’s former teammates, including George Hincapie, who was side by side for all of his seven Tour de France victories, agree to testify in the United States Anti-Doping Agency’s case against Armstrong.
lead_paragraph: Several of Lance Armstrong’s former teammates, including George Hincapie and Levi Leipheimer, will testify in the United States Anti-Doping Agency’s case against the retired cyclist.

headline.seo: Armstrong’s Ex-Teammates Said to Be Ready to Testify Against Him
headline.main: Ex-Teammates Are Said to Be Ready to Testify Against Armstrong
headline.print_headline: Ex-Teammates Said To Be Set to Testify Against Armstrong
